original_title: 51 Sri Lankan expats return from Kuwait
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); 51 Sri Lankan expatriates who were subject to various forms of harassment in Kuwait arrived at the Katunayake International Airport on Wednesday (23) morning.
The Sri Lanka Foreign Employment Bureau said they have been in Kuwait for over four years, and had left their employers and were working in other workplaces.
The Embassy of Sri Lanka in Kuwait had facilitated their return to Sri Lanka.
